code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Toast}from"bootstrap";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SuccessToast(_ref){let{show,message,onClose}=_ref;let[successToast,setSuccessToast]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const successEl=document.getElementById("successToast");const successToast=successEl?new Toast(successEl,{autohide:false}):null;if(show&&successToast){successToast===null||successToast===void 0?void 0:successToast.show();setSuccessToast(successToast);}},[show]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"toast-container position-fixed top-0 end-0 p-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"successToast",className:"toast bg-success text-white",role:"alert","aria-live":"assertive","aria-atomic":"true",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"toast-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{className:"me-auto",children:"Success"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",className:"btn-close","aria-label":"Close",onClick:()=>{onClose();successToast===null||successToast===void 0?void 0:successToast.hide();}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"toast-body",children:message})]})});}
